QuestData.Title: Border Issues
QuestData.Description:
They've closed off the entire valley! No wonder so many people have been complaining about trading with the Brennadam market.
We have to do something about this. These people need to make a living!
You're going to have to be an honorary cadet for me here, $n. Tell these ruffians to clear the road!
QuestData.LogDescription: Convince the House Stormsong militia to clear the blockade.
QuestData.RewardText: Good work! Now these fine people can go about their lives.
